definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: verb. waiting, so Thes SS Buhl, but very dub.,—only [[טוֹב וְיׇחִיל וְדוּמָם לְ]] La 3:26 good is it that one be waiting and that silently (but v. [[דוּמָם]]) for the salvation of ´[[י]]; construct. with [[ו]] and adj. hardly poss.; Ew Ke Lohr Ko:ii. 407 al. regard as vb. (fr. [[חול]]); rd. perh. [[וְיׁחִיל]] Hiph. Impf. fr. [[יחל]] (cf. v:La 3:24).
